home.hero_title: Invest in Sustainable Real Estate with Ease.
home.hero_text: Our mission is to make sustainable real estate investment profitable, virtuous, and accessible to everyone through a Security Token.
home.info_title: How Does the Kryptostone Ecosystem Work?
home.who_text: KryptoStone is a French fintech company founded in 2021 by a team of experts in real estate investment and blockchain. We believe that blockchain technology can offer a solution to facilitate real estate investment by reducing entry barriers, providing greater transparency, and enhancing investment security.
home.partner_text: ...and over 30 investors, property dealers, and real estate developers
home.press_text: ...and more than a dozen other media outlets

pools.title: Discover Our Investment Pools
pools.subtitle: Investment
pools.text: Find the opportunity that suits you in this selection of pools designed by our experts and exclusively available at KryptoStone.

pool.title: Pool Details
pool.subtitle: Pool
pool.text: Learn more about this investment pool and the different buildings it includes through key information that helps you invest in this project.
pool.text2: Discover all the investment pools available on the KryptoStone platform.
